reporter_caption.center: IN THE MATTER OF MAROTTA, 170 N.J. 258 (2002)

caption.center: IN THE MATTER OF LIBERO D. MAROTTA, AN ATTORNEY AT LAW

opinion.opinion_text: This matter having been duly presented to the Court, it is ORDERED that LIBERO D. MAROTTA, formerly of EDGEWATER, who was admitted to the bar of this State in 1955, and who was suspended from the practice of law for a period of two years effective September 2, 1999, by Order of this Court filed on May 24, 2001, be restored to the practice of law, effective immediately.
